name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Indian Kashmir to Indian Occupied Kashmir

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Made for Pakistani newspapers. Replaces text similar to 'Indian held Kashmir' to 'Occupied Kashmir', the official stance of Pakistan

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Made for Pakistani English newspapers. Replaces text similar to 'Indian held Kashmir' to 'Occupied Kashmir', which is the official stance of Pakistan.
